summary: A custom made Bodyslide preset for CBBE and Unified UNP Bodies, evocative of the Oblivion DMRA Body
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Description[/size]

I modded Oblivion for several years, and my favorite body was the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/42185/?]DMRA (Double Melons Round Ass) body[/url], most of my mods were conversions of outfits to fit that body. Skyrim of course has brought us Bodyslide, which automates much of that process.

I created this new preset based on the Oblivion DMRA body. It ranges from smaller than DMRA at it 0 weight, to notably larger at 100. Oblivion style DMRA can be found right around 70~75% weight.

For Details on the character, textures and outfits used in these screenshots please see [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71551?]Calina RaceMenu Preset[/url].

[b][size=4]Installation

[/size][/b]Unzip the file and drop into your Skyrim/Data folder. Or install using whatever mod-manager you prefer. Should work fine with Mod Organizer and Nexus Mod Manager. Wrye Bash BAIN won't like it because it doesn't contained recognized file paths, but if you use BAIN with Bodyslide you presumably know your way around that issue

After installing, open up Bodyslide and select "DMRA Enhanced" from the Preset dropdown. Rebuild your body and clothing meshes. Should work with both CBBE and Unified UNP bodies.

[size=4][b]Uninstallation

[/b][/size]Remove "DMRA Enhanced.xml" from this path:
Skyrim\data\Caliented Tools\Bodyslide\SliderPresets

[size=4][b]History

[/b][size=2]11/24/2015 - 1.0 - Initial Release
11/26/2015 - 1.1 - Fixed typo in the folder structure

[b][size=4]Credits[/size][/b]

Bodyslide - Caliente
UNP Body - dimon99
Unified UNP Body - [/size][/size]BringtheNoise
DMRA Body - Mktsang, Alexscorpion, HellKnight, Speedbuster, Edhildil, Coronerra, nabernas
Dark0ne and Nexusmods Staff
Bethesda
author: Nephenee13
